docs.text: Blogs Welcome to my portfolio blog section! Here, I share insights, experiences, and tutorials related to my journey in software development and data structures & algorithms. 1. My Journey into Software Development Starting out, I was fascinated by how technology shapes our world. I began learning programming with Python and gradually explored web development, building projects that challenged and improved my skills. 2. Mastering Data Structures and Algorithms Understanding data structures and algorithms has been crucial in solving complex problems efficiently. I share tips, resources, and example problems to help others strengthen their foundations. 3. Building My Portfolio Website Creating this portfolio was a rewarding experience. I used modern web technologies and focused on clean design and usability. In this post, I detail the tools and frameworks I used, and lessons learned along the way. 4. Tips for Aspiring Developers Breaking into tech can be daunting. I offer advice on learning paths, project ideas, and how to stay motivated during the journey. Stay tuned for more updates and tutorials!
docs.title: Blogs

docs.text: This is my about me page. 🌟 Assalam-o-Alaikum! 🇵🇰 I'm Azeem, a passionate developer from the heart of Pakistan! 💻 Coding is my chai, and creativity is my biryani masala. When I'm not debugging, you'll find me enjoying a hot cup of doodh patti ☕ or exploring the vibrant streets of Lahore. What I Love: - 🚀 Building cool web apps - 🎨 Designing with a desi twist - 📚 Learning new tech (and desi memes!) - 🍲 Foodie adventures (Nihari, anyone?) Skills: - JavaScript, Python, React - UI/UX with a sprinkle of Pakistani colors - Problem-solving with a side of humor 😄 Let's connect and add some Pakistani tarka to the tech world! Find me on LinkedIn | See my Projects “Code karo, khush raho!” ✨
docs.title: About Me

docs.text: These are my projects: Project 1 Description: This is the first project in my portfolio. It involves building a web application using Python and Flask.
